name: Solitaire 220 Plus
summary: "Solitaire 220 Plus" is a huge collection of famous Solitaire games presented in HD quality! Solitaire variants like Freecell, Fan, Four Seasons, Klondike, Spider, Golf and many more are waiting for you! Includes helpful tutorials for each Solitaire variant you want to play along with many different decks of cards, card backs and backgrounds.
